item.title: Adaptec getting rid of Snap and Eurologic
item.description: Byte & Switch report that Adaptec Says Sayonara to Systems This is a sad end to the Eurologic story. We have watched them grow from a tiny operation in the early 1990’s to their coup in getting an OEM deal with Dell. Then the mooted IPO, then the loss of the Dell deal followed by a fire-sale to Adaptec. At that point everyone thought they would be back on an upwards trajectory but it looks like it was not to be.
